questionList.qu: Find f(1) where f'(x)=`3^(3x)` and f(0)=1
questionList.solution: When integrating `a^(nx)`, use the inverse of the derivative (`(a^(nx))/(nlna)`). For `e^x`, recall that `ln e = log_ee = 1`
